articles.title: Lionel Messi conspiracy emerges as Portugal rage at ‘unacceptable’ appointment of Argentine referee
articles.description: Two Portugal stars have accused FIFA of ensuring they ‘can now give the title to Argentina’ with one ‘very weird’ decision.
articles.content:
Two Portugal veterans have taken aim at Lionel Messi, Argentina and FIFA in a bitter post-script to his country’s elimination from the World Cup.

articles.title: Morocco beat Portugal, France beat England
articles.description: And there were four. With Argentina and Croatia in, Morocco and France rounded out the semifinals bracket. Here's the latest from Qatar.
articles.content:
Craig Burley is full of praise for Morocco's performance and resilience after they become the first African team to make it to a World Cup semifinal. (1:41)

articles.title: Grant Wahl, an American journalist, died at the World Cup during the Netherlands-Argentina
articles.description: DOHA - "A journalist felt ill". The rumor begins to spread on the stands of Lusail, the stadium that in a week will host the final of the World Cup. The
articles.content: DOHA – “A journalist felt ill”. The rumor begins to spread on the stands of Lusail, the stadium that in a week will host the final of the World Cup. The tragedy took place there, in front of the eyes of incredulous colleagues, with some fool filming,... [2807 chars]

articles.title: Sergio Aguero tells Netherlands to 'go and play FIFA' as Argentina taunt Dutch after heated World Cup quarter-final
articles.description: Argentina beat Netherlands on penalties in an explosive World Cup quarter-final; Sergio Aguero taunted the Dutch players on social media while Nicolas Otamendi celebrated in their faces; Lionel Messi and Emiliano Martinez were also left furious
articles.content:
Sergio Aguero told the Netherlands to “go and play FIFA” after their penalty shootout loss to Argentina and was also filmed telling Wout Weghorst to “shut up” during a heated encounter in the tunnel after Friday’s stormy World Cup quarter-final.

articles.description: World Cup 2022 has reached the quarter-final stage in Qatar; the final is on December 18; two quarter-finals remaining on Saturday: Morocco vs Portugal, England vs France; confirmed semi-final on Tuesday sees Argentina face Croatia at 7pm
articles.content:

articles.title: Qatar World Cup 2022: FIFA charges Argentina for disorderly conduct during quarterfinal against Netherlands
articles.description: FIFA has opened a disciplinary case after the chippy end to Argentina's win in a penalty shootout
articles.content: FIFA has opened a disciplinary case against both the Argentina soccer federation and the Netherlands for its players actions in what was a contentious ending to their World Cup quarterfinal match. FIFA charged Argentina in particular under the "order... [1383 chars]

articles.title: ‘Unacceptable to have an Argentine referee’, ‘I don’t know if they’re going to give the trophy to Argentina’: Pepe & Fernandes rage over referee post Morocco defeat
articles.description: The duo expressed outrage over the appointment of Facunda Tello, an Argentinean, as the referee for their knockout fixture.
articles.content:
Portugal bowed out of the 2022 World Cup following a 1-0 defeat to Morocco in the quarter final on Saturday at the Al Thumama Stadium.

articles.title: “F*CK Them!”- Bruno Fernandes and Pepe Launch a Bizarre Verbal Attack on Argentina as They Blame Referee for Their Humiliating Defeat to Morocco
articles.description: The drama did not seem to stop there, as after the match Bruno Fernandes went on a bizarre rant that Argentina was behind all the bureaucracy.
